message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and unparalleled performance, it's a game-changer in its field. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing an exclusive offer of $15000 for this product. This is a great opportunity to secure a high-value item at an attractive price. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making this investment.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $12500 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the features and quality you've described. I'd appreciate it if you could consider my offer.
